Package com.camerontec.util.spring.components

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IExecutable
    This interface is implemented by components which can be started and stopped.
    IHasLifeCycle
    This interface is implemented by components wishing to expose life-cycle hooks to their container.
    IHasName
    This interface is implemented by components wishing to expose their name.
    IPerformsRecurringTask
    This interface is implemented by executable components that repeatedly execute a task with a given periodicity.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ExecutionState
    Defines the possible execution states of an executable component.
    InitializationState
    Defines the possible initialization states of a component.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ConfigurationRelatedInitializationException
    Instances of this class are thrown to indicate that a configuration-related error occurred when attempting to initialize a component.
    ExecutableStartException
    Instances of this class are thrown to indicate that an error occurred when attempting to start an IExecutable.
    InitializationException
    Instances of this class are thrown to indicate that a component failed to initialize and therefore cannot be used by the application.
    OperationException
    Instances of this class are thrown to indicate that an error occurred when attempting to invoke an operation on a component.
    ShuttingDownException
    Instances of this class are thrown to indicate that a component is in shutting down state.
